summary: A cast of characters, strikingly similar to the cast of Jersey Shore, try to survive an epidemic of sharks attacking Miami Beach.
cast: Jack Scalia|Jeremy Luke|Joseph Russo|Daniel Booko|Melissa Molinaro|Alex Mauriello|Audi Resendez|Tony Sirico|Grant Harvey|Dylan Vox|Ben Giroux|Gabrielle Christian|William Atherton|Paul Sorvino|Leigh Faith|Laura Schein|Nick Vallelonga|Joey Fatone|Todd Senofonte|Liz Leyda|Vinny Guadagnino|Krystal Tini|Al Sapienza|Joey Diaz|Dave Mays|Jack Carlisle|Al Carabello|Ted Monte|Sonny Carl Davis|J Ferguson|Scott Thomas Reynolds|Sam Upton|Stan Bly|JoJo Wright|Joanna Bartling|Lars Canty|Michael Tari|Marco Tazioli|Joseph White
title: Jersey Shore Shark Attack
